name: EDENStories.OpeningTheAlbum
description:
EDENStories.OpeningTheAlbum
EDEN Stories is a mediarchaeological narrative composed of images in Videotex. The whole story is accessible by alternately consulting objkt.com and hicetnunc.art

Format: PNG based on Videotex (used to encode the information of the French MINITEL, used from 1980 to 2012).
Dimension : 320 x 250 px.
Color: Greyscale.

To make its NFTs, CEGZ.project uses tools created by @zigazou and @PAMALGroup.
